downloadTitle: Microsoft Search in Bing Mobile Overview
downloadDescription: Work doesn’t always happen in the office. Microsoft Search in Bing is a secure way to find and access files, info, and more.
detailsSection: Work doesn’t always happen in the office. Microsoft Search in Bing is a secure way to find and access files, info, and more—no matter where you are.
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. Important: After you save the file, open the downloaded .pdf. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
